18.さいほうとは 素材となる布を ぬいあわせて|目的のアイテムを 作ることです。|<:
A sewing method is the process of cutting and|sewing together fabric to create a desired|item... The cut fabric is wove together and|
|shaped to follow the success line... The|quality of the finished product depends on|the accuracy of this... It takes|
|concentration to execute a command... If you|lose your concentration, you won't be able to|do it, so pace yourself and choose your|
|commands. The more power you have, the more|you'll be able to pull it off, but each time|you pull it off, the power will change. The|
|more power you have, the more you'll be able|to... If the game is interrupted by a|communication error while you are playing,|
|you will lose your ticket...

19.さいほうの遊び方の説明です！|<br>|カットされた布を ぬいあわせて|成功ライ:
Here's how to play it again! Wipe the cut|pieces of cloth together and shape them to|fit the success line... When all the squares|
|meet the success line, use the "finish"|command to complete the game. The strength of|the cloth changes each time it's sewn. The|
|strength of your wipe changes with each wipe,|so keep an eye on your wiping power and the|amount of concentration you have left to|
|achieve your goal!

20.さいほう設備がある。|さいほう部員であれば|ここで アイテムが作れそうだ。: Sewing equipment... If you're a member of the|Saiho club, you can make items here...

22.強化週間品となっている|アイテムを 作りましょう！: We're going to create an item that will|become an Enhanced Weekly Item!

25.強化週間品となっている アイテムを|できのよさ ★３（大成功）で しあげましょう: You'll be able to get the best out of the|items that you've got in your collection.

32.<color_yellow>|学園内では 所属する部の設備を使って|何度でも 練:
On campus, you can practice as often as you|like using the facilities of your club...|When you practice, you lose nothing if you|
|succeed or fail, so feel free to try it|out... You can learn how to make items by|clicking on the "Show description" command...|
|If you change the club you belong to, you can|practice with other clubs' equipment... You|can practice as much as you want and improve|
|your skills...
